feed.title: Planning Twitter Bot
feed.subtitle: The Planning Twitter Bot english project.

entry.title: Golang
entry.content:
Golang is a programming language created by Google used in a lot of projects, like Docker, Kubernetes, Uber, …

This language seems to be a really complete programming language and permit to do a lot of things, to make syntax clear and concise, and make complex calculations.

Also, Golang is usable for programming the Twitter Bot we want to do thanks to a lot of libraries.

Exemples :

var i int = 0
j := 0 Here there are two way to initialize variables, they are equivalents but the second is shorter.


func test(x, y string) (string, string) {
	return y, x
} This is the way to initialize functions in **Golang**. The first key word is *func* followed by the name of the function, here *test*. The first brackets are the passing arguments and their type, and the seconds are the type of the return arguments. With **Golang**, you can return more than one arguments.
entry.summary: Golang is a programming language created by Google used in a lot of projects, like Docker, Kubernetes, Uber, …
